member.name: T:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer
member.summary: Provides properties, methods, and events that give control over how the viewer appears and functions.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.ICrystalReportViewer.Zoom(System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the magnification level of the CrystalReportViewer control.
member.param: Indicates the percentage at which to magnify the CrystalReportViewer.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowFirstPage
member.summary: Shows the first page of the report.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowNextPage
member.summary: Shows the next page of the report.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowPreviousPage
member.summary: Shows the previous page of the report.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowLastPage
member.summary: Shows the last page of the report.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowNthPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows the specified page of the report.
member.param: Indicates the page number to show in the CrystalReportViewer control.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowGroupTree
member.summary: Shows the group tree in the viewer.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.CloseView(System.Object)
member.summary: Closes a view tab in the viewer.
member.param: Indicates a string value that contains the name of the view tab.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.PrintReport
member.summary: Prints the report displayed in the viewer.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.RefreshReport
member.summary: Refreshes the report displayed in the viewer.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ExportReport
member.summary: Exports the report displayed in the viewer.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.SearchForText(System.String)
member.summary: Searches the report for the given text.
member.param: Represents the string to search for.
member.returns: Returns true if the text was found, or false if the text was not found.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.Zoom(System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the magnification level of the viewer.
member.param: Indicates the percentage at which to magnify the CrystalReportViewer.

member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.GetCurrentPageNumber
member.summary: Gets the current page number of the report.
member.returns: Returns the page number that is currently displayed in the CrystalReportViewer.

member.summary: Drills down on a group.
member.param: The group to drill down on.

member.summary: Gets or sets the information needed to create an internal Reportsource object.

member.summary: Gets or sets the logon information for an enterprise report.

member.summary: Gets or sets the parameter fields collection.

member.summary: Gets or sets the TableLogOnInfos collection.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.SelectionFormula
member.summary: Gets or sets the record selection formula of the report.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ViewTimeSelectionFormula
member.summary: String. Gets or sets the record selection formula to filter the data that are currently used in the report.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.RightToLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the text appears from right to left, such as when using Hebrew or Arabic fonts.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the control.

member.summary: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.BackgroundImageLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout enumeration.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowPageNavigateButtons
member.summary: Boolean. Gets or sets whether the CrystalReportViewer control toolbar has the buttons for page navigation.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowGotoPageButton
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the viewer toolbar has the button for specifying page number.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowCloseButton
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the viewer toolbar has the button for closing a report page.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the print button on the toolbar is visible or hidden.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowRefreshButton
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the refresh button on the toolbar is visible or hidden.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowExportButton
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the viewer toolbar has the button for exporting.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowGroupTreeButton
member.summary: Gets whether the viewer toolbar has the button for showing or hiding the group tree.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.ShowZoomButton
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the zoom factor list on the toolbar is visible or hidden.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the user can drill down into the report.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the search button on the toolbar is visible or hidden.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the tree view is visible or hidden.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the toolbar is visible or hidden.

member.summary: Gets or sets the report to bind to the viewer.

member.summary: Determines whether the report is offset from the edge of its view window.

member.summary: Boolean. Gets or Sets whether tool tips are displayed in the report viewer.

member.name: P:CrystalDecisions.Windows.Forms.CrystalReportViewer.DisplayStatusBar
member.summary: Boolean. Gets or set whether the status bar is visible or hidden.

member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the active view in the viewer.

member.summary: Gets the number of views in the viewer.

member.summary: Event fires when text is searched for in the report.

member.summary: Event fires when the data in the report is refreshed.

member.summary: Gets or sets the page number to start searching at.

member.summary: Gets or sets the direction in which to search. This can be either Backward or Forward.

members.member: Provides an edit control that only accepts numbers with addition restrictions such as whether negatives and decimals are allowed.
Controls whether the edit control allows decimal values
Controls whether the edit control allows negative values
